2014 Region VI District Small Business Award Nomination Guidelines Supplement.San Antonio.doc
pageTitle: 2014 SBA San Antonio District Office - Small Business Week Awards | The U.S. Small Business Administration | SBA.gov
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {959=All award nominations must be postmarked or hand delivered to the SBA San Antonio District Office located at Hipolito F. Garcia Federal Bldg. 615 E. Houston, Suite 298, San Antonio TX 78205  no later than January 17, 2014., 1497=In recognition of the small business community’s contribution to the American economy and society, the President of the United States designates one week each year as National Small Business Week. Leading up to National Small Business Week 2014, the U.S. Small Business Administration (SBA), often in conjunction with public- and private-sector small business supporters, will host special events at the local and state levels to honor and present awards to local entrepreneurs.}
textBeforeTable: File Attachments:  Please see the following attachments for instructions on submissions and required forms.   http://nationalsmallbusinessweek.sba.gov/ Here is the link to the National Small Business Week Website for Nomination Guidelines. All award nominations must be postmarked or hand delivered to the SBA San Antonio District Office located at Hipolito F. Garcia Federal Bldg. 615 E. Houston, Suite 298, San Antonio TX 78205  no later than January 17, 2014.   In recognition of the small business community’s contribution to the American economy and society, the President of the United States designates one week each year as National Small Business Week. Leading up to National Small Business Week 2014, the U.S. Small Business Administration (SBA), often in conjunction with public- and private-sector small business supporters, will host special events at the local and state levels to honor and present awards to local entrepreneurs. 2014 SBA San Antonio District Office - Small Business Week Awards
textAfterTable: In Partnership with Business USA Aid, counsel, assist and protect, insofar as is possible, the interests of small business concerns.
